rukus.text: And the night, as it becomes calm
(Oh Muhammad, SAW), your Lord has not forsaken you; He is not displeased
The life to come is better for you than the earlier life
Soon, your Lord will grant you (His blessings); you shall be well-pleased
Did He not find you an orphan, and gave you shelter
He found you unguided, and guided you
Found you poor, and enriched you
So do not oppress the orphan
And do not (angrily) repulse (and rebuff) the needy, the beggar
(Rather), proclaim the favors of your Lord
